Reuters reported, citing people familiar with the matter, that Kroger is in the second round of an auction, and is competing with other bidders such as private-equity firms Apollo Global Management LLC APO, -2.43% and KKR & Co. L.P. KKR, -2.82% Kroger's stock slipped 0.8% in afternoon trade.
Fresh Market Inc.'s stock tfm soared 14% in active afternoon trade, after Reuters reported that supermarket chain Kroger Co. KR, -1.32% was seeking to acquire the company.
In October, Fresh Market said it would conduct a strategic review of its business, that could lead to a potential sale of the company.
The stock was still down 42% over the past 12 months, while while Kroger shares were up 2.1% and the S&P 500 had lost 12%.
The surge comes about 2 1/2 weeks after the stock closed at a record low of $18.46, on Jan. 25.
